resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81226</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81226</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Student Activities for Bach Cantata</string>
            <string language="es">Actividades para los estudiantes sobre la Cantata de Bach</string>
            <string language="ga">Gníomhaíochtaí Dalta do Cantata Bach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer-Aktivitäten für Bach Kantate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités d'étudiant pour la cantate de Bach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades do estudante para o cantata de Bach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività dell'allievo per il cantata di Bach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες σπουδαστών για την καντάτα Bach</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan aimed at all levels. It presents a number of different activities as starting points for the study of the set work. Teachers may select from the list in any order depending on the level of the class, progress of the students, etc.</string>
            <string language="es">Un plan de lección dirigido a todos los niveles. Presenta varias actividades como puntos de inicio para el estudio del trabajo establecido. Los profesores pueden hacer selecciones en la lista en cualquier orden, dependiendo del nivel de la clase, el progr</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta dírithe ar gach leibhéal. Cuireann sé i láthair roinnt gníomhaíochtaí difriúla mar phointí tosaigh don staidéar ar obair éigeantach. Féadfaidh múinteoirí iad a roghnú ó liosta ag brath ar leibhéal an ranga, dul chun cinn na ndaltaí, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Set Works</string>
            <string language="es">Obras musicales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Saothair Éigeantacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan strebte alle Stufen an. Er 
stellt eine Anzahl von unterschiedlichen Aktivitäten wie 
Ausgangspunkte für die Studie der Setarbeit dar. Lehrer können
von der Liste in jeder möglicher Ordnung abhängig von der Stufe der 
Kategorie, Fortschritt der Kursteilnehmer, usw. auswählen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon a visé tous les niveaux. 
Il présente un certain nombre de différentes activités 
pendant que les points de départ pour l'étude du positionnement 
fonctionnent. Les professeurs peuvent choisir parmi la liste 
dans n'importe quelle commande selon le niveau de la classe, le 
progrès des étudiants, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição visou todos os níveis. 
Apresenta um número de atividades diferentes enquanto os pontos
começar para o estudo do jogo trabalham. Os professores podem 
selecionar da lista em toda a ordem dependendo do nível da classe, do
progresso dos estudantes, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione ha puntato su tutti i 
livelli. Presenta un certo numero di attività differenti mentre
i punti di partenza per lo studio sull'insieme funzionano. Gli 
insegnanti possono scegliere dalla lista in tutto l'ordine secondo il 
livello del codice categoria, il progresso degli allievi, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος που στοχεύει σε όλα τα επίπεδα.
Παρουσιάζει διάφορες διαφορετικές δραστηριότητες ως 
αφετηρίες για τη μελέτη της καθορισμένης εργασίας. Οι 
δάσκαλοι μπορούν να επιλέξουν από τον κατάλογο σε οποιαδήποτε 
κατάταξη ανάλογα με το επίπεδο της κλάσης, προόδου των 
σπουδαστών, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie Arbeiten Ein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Placez Les Travaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajuste Trabalhos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regoli Gli Impianti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμένες εργασίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>

          </identifier>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
